title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 07 April 2017 - XWiki
content:
<edvorg> has joined #xwiki  
03:42 <edvorg> has quit  
03:44 <edvorg> has joined #xwiki  
04:10 <edvorg> has quit  
04:11 <edvorg> has joined #xwiki  
04:12 <sdumitriu> has joined #xwiki  
06:38 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
07:10 <mflorea> has quit  
08:00 <edvorg> has quit  
09:37 <msmeria> has joined #xwiki  
10:09 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
10:12 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
10:14 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
10:28 <floflobel> has joined #xwiki  
11:19 <Antoine\_\_\_> has joined #xwiki  
11:22 <msmeria1> has joined #xwiki  
11:22 <msmeria> has quit  
11:24 <Antoine\_\_\_> Hello, I did a wiki upgrade from 8.4 to 9.2 which caused a problem with Administration Application 8.4: When I tried to upgrade Administration Application 8.4 using the Extension Manager, it says that the extension is installed but invalid.  
11:25 <Antoine\_\_\_> So I tried to repair it but this message appears : Failed to apply [UNINSTALL] for extension [Administration Application 8.4] on namespace [Actility] from previous extension(s) [org.xwiki.platform:xwiki-platform-administration-ui-8.4]  
11:25 <Antoine\_\_\_> Exception thrown during job execution  
11:25 <Antoine\_\_\_> I get the same message by trying to uninstall it.  
11:25 <Antoine\_\_\_> Can you explain to me what it is due to please?  
11:36 <systemd> has quit  
11:36 <systemd> has joined #xwiki  
11:37 <Antoine\_\_\_> !help  
11:44 <systemd> has quit  
11:44 <systemd> has joined #xwiki  
12:07 <systemd> has quit  
12:07 <systemd> has joined #xwiki  
12:25 <Antoine\_\_\_> has quit  
14:09 <Antoine\_\_\_> has joined #xwiki  
14:12 <Antoine\_\_\_> has quit  
14:13 <Antoine\_\_\_> has joined #xwiki  
14:22 <Antoine\_\_\_> Hello, I would like to display only the "login with Google" button on the login page. However, I can not find a way to remove the "login with XWiki" button. Could you please explain to me how to do that? Thank you in advance.  
14:23 <vmassol> Hi Antoine\_\_\_  
14:24 <vmassol> I've never done this but I guess you'll need to override the default skin with your own skin to override login.vm  
14:24 <vmassol> that should allow you to control what the user sees on the login screen  
14:24 <systemd> has quit  
14:25 <systemd> has joined #xwiki  
14:37 <Antoine\_\_\_> Hi Vincent, thank you for your immediate response, I will follow your advice  
14:43 <Antoine\_\_\_> Do you also know what the problem I posted this morning is?  
14:44 <vmassol> no idea but you could go back to the update job logs and paste the exaxt stack trace on pastebin for ex  
14:44 <vmassol> you'll need to click on the message to open it  
14:44 <vmassol> by message I mean " Failed to apply [UNINSTALL] for extension [Administration Application 8.4] on namespace [Actility] from previous extension(s) [org.xwiki.platform:xwiki-platform-administration-ui-8.4]"  
14:47 <systemd> has quit  
14:48 <systemd> has joined #xwiki  
14:57 <Antoine\_\_\_> Okay : https://pastebin.com/KukA6yK7  
15:09 <msmeria1> has quit  
15:27 <tmortagne> Antoine\_\_\_: looks like a bug but can't tell what's wrong exactly without a way to reproduce it  
15:28 <tmortagne> the error suggest that a new XAR extension has the same id than an already installed JAR extension  
15:29 <tmortagne> this code was not expecting that, I will fix this but it still very weird to have this situation  
15:30 <Antoine\_\_\_> thank you, i just upgrade the Wiki 8.4 to 9.2 then the administration app is "Installed version 8.4 is not valid". I have the error message when i want to upgrade, repare or delete  
15:31 <Antoine\_\_\_> I use the extension manager  
15:31 <tmortagne> Antoine\_\_\_: I did this upgrade several times too but never got this issue  
15:31 <tmortagne> I don't think you can that the exact same error when you delete  
15:32 <tmortagne> this error means there was something upgraded  
15:33 <Antoine\_\_\_> you're true : https://pastebin.com/0rf3icvZ  
15:34 <tmortagne> hmm there is something weird  
15:34 <tmortagne> it might be because this extension is invalid actually  
15:34 <Antoine\_\_\_> i hzve the same error with "repaire" and "uninstall"  
15:35 <tmortagne> yes I think there is a bug with invalid extension actually  
15:36 <tmortagne> what I don't understand is why you have Admin 8.3 installed  
15:36 <tmortagne> the upgrade to 9.2 went ok ?  
15:36 <tmortagne> s/8.3/8.4/  
15:36 <msmeria> has joined #xwiki  
15:37 <tmortagne> do you see admin 9.2 installed too ?  
15:37 <Antoine\_\_\_> I have upgraded the wiki but the admin app still in 8.4  
15:37 <Antoine\_\_\_> nope  
15:38 <tmortagne> does not make much sense, somethiing happen during the upgrade ?  
15:38 <tmortagne> does not make much sense, something happen during the upgrade ?  
15:38 <tmortagne> anyway testing uninstall of invalid XAR extension  
15:41 <tmortagne> Antoine\_\_\_: did you try to restart since you have this issue ?  
15:43 <Antoine\_\_\_> I don't had troubles during the upgrade. I can't restart for the moment the wiki is on service. Do you think it can resolve ?  
15:43 <Antoine\_\_\_> Are u french too ?  
15:43 <tmortagne> for some reason you have an XAR extension marked as installed but which can't be found in the XAR extension repository, from what I see in the code it should not happen so make somehting corrupted the extension index in memory  
15:43 <tmortagne> yes  
15:44 <Antoine\_\_\_> Ok donc un restart pourrait le remettre en place ?  
15:45 <tmortagne> it's a public chat so better talk in english for other, yes a restart might fix your issue  
15:46 <tmortagne> still what does not make much sense is that it's impossible that upgrade went well if you don't have Admin 9.2 installed  
15:47 <tmortagne> looks a lot like an upgrade that would have crashed during it's execution  
15:48 <Antoine\_\_\_> But the more strange is that i have the new style of administration menu  
15:49 <Antoine\_\_\_> "collapsible menu"  
15:49 <tmortagne> yes so for me the Admin 9.2 was imported and then crashed while it was updating the installed extensions index  
15:50 <tmortagne> anyway try to restart to see if it fixed the nullpointer exeception error  
15:50 <Antoine\_\_\_> Ok merci à toi et à Vincent, je ferais un restart ce soir et vous tient au courant  
15:50 <tmortagne> ok  
15:56 <vmassol> Antoine\_\_\_: ok I can't help with this, looks like a bug. You should check if it's not already reported and fixed in jira and if not create a new issue for it. That seems important. thanks  
15:56 <vmassol> maybe tmortagne knows more about it  
15:56 <vmassol> oops  
15:56 <vmassol> just got the past messages from irc now  
15:57 <vmassol> with 2 minutes of lag...  
15:57 <vmassol> so disregard what I've said, I see thomas has already replied :)  
16:03 <Antoine\_\_\_> Thanks to you two ! It was just enough to make a restart ^^ '  
16:04 <tmortagne> Antoine\_\_\_: ok :)  
17:03 <Antoine\_\_\_> has quit  
17:19 <evalica> has quit  
17:36 <msmeria> has quit  
17:55 <slayerjain> has joined #xwiki  
17:56 <Aranjedeath> has joined #xwiki  
18:14 <xwikiorg\_guest\_8> has joined #xwiki  
18:16 <xwikiorg\_guest\_8> Does xwiki currently support Markdown syntax?  
18:34 <mflorea> has quit  
19:09 <floflobel> has quit  
19:15 <xwikiorg\_guest\_8> and if it does, can the settings be changed to only accept Markdown?  
19:25 <LudovicDubost[m]> Hi yes markdown is supported.. you need to install markdown 1.2 extension  
19:25 <LudovicDubost[m]> Hi, you can set the default syntax as markdown and remove xwiki syntax.. not sure what will happen for existing pages  
19:25 <LudovicDubost[m]> Now you need to be aware that with markdown not all wysiwyg content will be kept as markdown does not support all HTML  
19:27 <xwikiorg\_guest\_8> Okay, but if I am only interested in keeping basic Markdown files in the wiki, that shouldn't be a problem correct?  
19:27 <LudovicDubost[m]> yes  
19:29 <xwikiorg\_guest\_8> Is the wysiwyg syntax still enabled if I switch to just Markdown and disable xwiki syntax? sorry, im not very familiar with wysiwyg  
19:35 <Slashman> has quit  
19:35 <Pbas> has quit  
19:36 <xwikiorg\_guest\_8> Well, i can just try it out and get my answer. Thanks for the help!  
19:58 <LudovicDubost[m]> I'm not sure exactly..  you can set the wiki to only use Wiki editor also  
19:58 <LudovicDubost[m]> There is a setting per user for this  
20:00 <xwikiorg\_guest\_8> It seems to only allow Markdown when I select the edit button. However, if i select wysiwyg, or wiki, under the edit button, it will allow me to edit in those styles  
20:00 <xwikiorg\_guest\_8> Is there a way to disable these buttons maybe?  
20:01 <LudovicDubost[m]> You are advanced this is why you have the choice, otherwise it will choose what is in your settings  
20:01 <slayerjain> has quit  
20:01 <LudovicDubost[m]> Worst case you can disable in the template  
20:01 <LudovicDubost[m]> Now the wysiwyg works with Markdown  
20:02 <LudovicDubost[m]> it's just that if you do too fancy stuff in your wysiwyg it might be stripped  
20:03 <xwikiorg\_guest\_8> Okay, that makes sense. I will keep working with it. Thanks again!  
20:18 <xwikiorg\_guest\_8> has quit
